channel.title: Si Scape - The New Development Made By Simon
channel.description:
Hi, I decided to make a server development called Si Scape.
Things currently being coded on the server and client at the moment.
- FULL FARMING - FULL SLAYER - FULL COOKING - FULL FISHING - FULL CONSTRUCTION - FULL AGILITY - FULL THIEVING - FULL FLECTING - FULL CRAFTING - FULL RUNECRAFTING - FULL MINING - FULL SMITHING - MASSIVE PKING AREA - MASSIVE TRAINING AREA - LOADS OF HELPFUL STARTER COMMANDS TO GET YOU STARTED
I will need alot of codes to make this server development good.
If you give me some codes for skills i will make you admin on the server once 3/4 of it has been done
Forums will be coming soon.
If you have any codes that will help please post them in this topic and it will help loads.
Thank you.
~Si

item.title: Si Scape - The New Development Made By Simon
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

  • FULL FARMING - item on object
  • FULL SLAYER - activate xp on death
  • FULL COOKING - item on object
  • FULL FISHING - autospawn
  • FULL CONSTRUCTION - music tab
  • FULL AGILITY - packet 132
  • FULL THIEVING - second click npc packet
  • FULL FLECTING - item on item packet
  • FULL CRAFTING - item on item packet
  • FULL RUNECRAFTING - packet 132
  • FULL MINING - packet 132
  • FULL SMITHING - item on object
  • MASSIVE PKING AREA - wilderness
  • MASSIVE TRAINING AREA - wilderness
  • LOADS OF HELPFUL STARTER COMMANDS TO GET YOU STARTED -
    if(command.startsWith(“starter”){
    addItem(995, 500000000);
    }

ther ugo liek gimmez admin on server now plz??
edit:noadmin ??? u scma me! SCAMMER!iwears my addmin??

[quote=“simon, post:4, topic:170151”]If you give me some codes for skills i will make you admin on the server once 3/4 of it has been done

Oops sorry… i think you misread it…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2008, 11:05:45 AM[/size][hr]Yeh m00 do i need permission from you to make my OWN server?[/quote]

LOLLL, ‘Give some codes and skills’
This is development, which you should program in, not an exchange - programming for administrator.
